name: Fragmented Spirit of Fire
effect: b'On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.'
flavor_text: b"Fissures skate across Flagma's mantle. Gouts of flame torch the Oasis. Uncontrollable magma spills forth as the fragmented leyline burns itself to a cinder.

name: Fragmented Spirit of Water
effect: b'On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.'
flavor_text: b'Relentless hail stabs the frozen air. Hoarfrost chokes Krustal of life. Crystalline daggers of ice form from the deluge of rain as the fragmented leyline shatters.'

name: Fragmented Spirit of Wind
effect: b'On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.'
flavor_text: b'The thunderclouds darken above. Windscream pierces through the barriers of Winbless. Tempests of madness drive the fragmented leyline to the brink.'

name: Tristan, Underhanded
effect: b'On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don\xe2\x80\x99t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 \xe2\x80\x94 Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cConsider it done. Just worry about my payment.\xe2\x80\x9d'

name: Tristan, Hired Blade
effect: b'Tristan Lineage\nOn Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.'

name: Tristan, Shadowreaver
effect: b'Tristan Lineage\r\nTristan can level up into champions of the same base level. When she does, draw two cards.\nOn Enter: Banish the top four cards of target opponent\xe2\x80\x99s deck face down. As long as they\xe2\x80\x99re banished, you may play those cards, ignoring their elemental requirements.'

name: Alkahest
effect: b'At the beginning of your recollection phase, put an age counter on a Potion item you control.\n[Level 4+] Banish Alkahest: Destroy target item or weapon with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less.'
flavor_text: b'The universal solvent and a corrosive solution.'

name: Backup Charger
effect: b'3, Banish Backup Charger: Summon a Powercell token rested. Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cRunning out of energy too fast? In a pinch? Our prototype failsafe will guarantee you a fresh charge!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advert'

name: Clockwork Musicbox
effect: b'Hindered (This object enters the field rested.)\n[Class Bonus] Whenever you activate a Harmony or Melody card from your hand, you may banish it as it resolves.\nREST: You may activate a card banished by Clockwork Musicbox. (You still pay its costs.)'

name: Framework Sidearm
effect: b'(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can\xe2\x80\x99t be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] You may pay 3 to activate this card from your material deck.'
flavor_text: b'A lightweight frame for covert operations.'

name: Mercenary's Blade
effect: b'[Class Bonus] You may remove a preparation counter from your champion to activate this card from your material deck. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b"A razor-sharp shiv prepared at a moment's notice.

name: Mercurial Heart
effect: b'Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)\nOn Enter: Put a buff counter on target Automaton ally you control.'
flavor_text: b'The first heartbeat began the downfall of Azoth.'

name: Prototype Shield
effect: b'Unit Link (This object enters the field linked to target unit. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\n[Class Bonus] If damage would be dealt to linked unit while it\xe2\x80\x99s attacking, prevent 3 of that damage. (This also prevents damage that would be dealt by a retaliating defender.)'

name: Steel Slug
effect: b'Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner\xe2\x80\x99s material deck instead.)\nREST: Load Steel Slug into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker\xe2\x80\x99s intent.)'

name: Worn Diary
effect: b'REST: Put a page counter on Worn Diary for each card in your memory.\nREST, Banish Worn Diary: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if there are ten or more page counters on Worn Diary.'

name: Blast Shield
effect: b'Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 2 damage to your champion.\n[Class Bonus] Linked ally gets +2 power.'

name: Contraband Revolver
effect: b'(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can\xe2\x80\x99t be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] On Attack: If the attacker is attacking a champion, Contraband Revolver gets +2 power for this attack.'

name: Forgelight Blade
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Forgelight Blade gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)\nOn Enter: Deal 4 damage to your champion.'
flavor_text: b'Molten power radiates from within.'

name: Impact Hammer
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Impact Hammer gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)\nWhenever a unit uses this weapon for an attack, deal 3 damage to it.'

name: Krustallan Longsword
effect: b'[Class Bonus] As long as you have four or more water element cards in your graveyard, Krustallan Longsword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b'Forged from ancestral Krusteel and sheathed in frost.'

name: Loaded Thoughts
effect: b'(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can\xe2\x80\x99t be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] Whenever Loaded Thoughts becomes loaded, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard.'

name: Tideholder Claymore
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nAs an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 10, reduced by 1 for each water element card in your graveyard.\n'
flavor_text: b'A tidal wave of unrelenting force.'

name: Vaporjet Shield
effect: b'Unit Link (This object enters the field linked to target unit. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\n[Class Bonus] If damage would be dealt to linked unit, prevent 1 of that damage.'

name: Ceremonial Stormblade
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a durability counter on Ceremonial Stormblade for each wind element ally you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b'An ornamental sword that rallies the winds.'

name: Emerald Pistol
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Materialize a Bullet card with memory cost 0 from your material deck. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b'Preloaded with whatever you deem necessary.'

name: Mechanized Smasher
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nMechanized Smasher can\xe2\x80\x99t be used with attack cards.\nAs an additional cost to use Mechanized Smasher for an attack, reveal four wind element cards from your memory. '

name: Winbless Kiteshield
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nUnit Link (This object enters the field linked to target unit. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked unit has vigor.'

name: Windpiercer
effect: b'Renewable\nREST: Load Windpiercer into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\nOn Attack: Glimpse 1, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is wind element, Windpiercer gets +2 power.'

name: Lunar Conduit
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nWhenever you activate an astra element card, put a charge counter on Lunar Conduit.\n3, REST: As a Spell, deal an amount of damage to target unit equal to the amount of charge counters on Lunar Conduit. Then remove a charge counter from Lunar Conduit.'

name: Aegis of Dawn
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nWhenever your champion is dealt four or more damage, summon an Automaton Drone Drone token.'
flavor_text: b'The Dawn Vanguard stride into battle, fearless of death or destruction as another will always rise.'

name: Alchemical Scripture
effect: b'At the beginning of your end phase, if you control four or more tokens, draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe theoretics of consumptive alchemy suggest that the energy density of soul matter can be condensed into a hypothetical jewel of limitless potential.\xe2\x80\x9d'

name: Gloamspire Mantle
effect: b'[Tristan Bonus] On Enter: You may pay 3. If you do, summon an Ominous Shadow token.\nUmbra element phantasia allies you control have ambush. (They may retaliate against attackers while not defending.)'

name: Memento Mori
effect: b'Whenever an ally dies, put a prize counter on Memento Mori.\nBanish Memento Mori: Draw three cards. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if there are six or more prize counters on Memento Mori.'

name: Shadow's Claw
effect: b'As long as you have four or more preparation counters on your champion, you may activate this card from your material deck.\n[Tristan Bonus] Phantasia allies you control can attack using Shadow\xe2\x80\x99s Claw. When they do, put a durability counter on Shadow\xe2\x80\x99s Claw.'

name: Sorrowcaller
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Reveal the hit opponent\xe2\x80\x99s memory. Deal an amount of unpreventable damage to the hit champion equal to the amount of cards with reserve cost 3 or greater revealed this way.'
flavor_text: b'Punish the guilty. Harvest the weak.'

name: Atmos Armor Type-Hermes
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a Powercell.\nSpellshroud (Units with spellshroud can\xe2\x80\x99t be targeted by Spells.)\n[Level 1+] Other Automaton allies you control get +1 power.'

name: Automaton Beastkeeper
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may return a Beast ally card from your graveyard to your memory.'
flavor_text: b'Relentless ferocity never stays buried long. The thread of life calls back the untamed wilds from the brink.'

name: Automaton Drone
flavor_text: b"Schedule routine maintenance examinations every two years. Do not expose to temperatures in excess of 500 degrees for prolonged periods.\n\xe2\x80\x94 Manufacturer's Recommendations

name: Bandage Wound
effect: b'Recover 4. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cI have to save her. I can\xe2\x80\x99t lose Rose again!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Claude, Fated Visionary'

name: Bertha, Spry Howitzer
effect: b'Fast Activation, Ranged 2\n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] On Enter: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may activate a Ranger action card with reserve cost 2 or less from among them without paying its costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.'

name: Blightroot
effect: b'Sacrifice Blightroot: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.'

name: Buried Grief
effect: b'Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.'
flavor_text: b'Claude knelt before their graves grief-stricken. Everything he did and everyone he loved had turned against him. When would the nightmare end?'

name: Cell Assembler
effect: b'On Enter: You may pay 2. If you do, summon a Powercell token rested.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cKrustal\xe2\x80\x99s freeze got you locked in your castle? With the latest line of assemblers, you\xe2\x80\x99ll never go cold!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advertisement'

name: Charged Hunter
effect: b'Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power.) \n[Class Bonus] On Enter: If you control another Automaton ally or a Powercell, Charged Hunter becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller\xe2\x80\x99s turn.)'

name: Charged Mannequin
effect: b'As long as you control a Powercell, Charged Mannequin gets +1 power.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cSilken Street, say hello to your new fashion model! Made to engage with the most exclusive of clientele.\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advertisement'

name: City Protector
effect: b'Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) \nOn Foster: Summon an Automaton Drone token.'
flavor_text: b'The people\xe2\x80\x99s protector, serving with a smile.'

name: Critical Recovery
effect: b'Remove all temporary damage from target ally. If that ally is an Automaton, put a buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)'
flavor_text: b'With his penultimate act, Claude used up the rest of his strength, willing Rose back from the brink.'

name: Dodge Roll
effect: b'Prevent the next 3 non-combat damage that would be dealt to target unit you control this turn. That unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller\xe2\x80\x99s turn.)'

name: Engineered Slime
effect:
b'Pride 2
[Class Bonus] Whenever you sacrifice a Powercell, choose one\xe2\x80\x94
\xe2\x80\xa2 Put a buff counter on Engineered Slime.
\xe2\x80\xa2 Engineered Slime gains spellshroud until end of turn.'

name: Fraysia
effect: b'Sacrifice Fraysia: Recover 1.'

name: Gearshift Block
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.\nThe next time damage would be dealt to target ally you control this turn, prevent that damage.'
flavor_text: b'Frozen Krusteel shields deflect most errant bolts.'

name: Geldus, Terror of Dorumegia
effect: b'Pride 4\n[Level 3+] This card costs 2 less to activate.\n[Class Bonus] On Enter: Geldus gains your choice of spellshroud or taunt until the beginning of your next turn.'

name: Harvester Mk II
effect: b'Automaton allies you control have \xe2\x80\x9cOn Death: Summon a Powercell token.\xe2\x80\x9d'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cFor our loyal Gearstride customers, our Harvester prototype automates maintenance like never before!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advertisement'

name: Hide in Bush
effect: b'Brew \xe2\x80\x94 Four Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card\xe2\x80\x99s reserve cost.)\nYour champion gains stealth until end of turn. (This champion can\xe2\x80\x99t be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)'

name: Hub of Innovation
effect: b'On Enter: Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'At the crossroads of commerce, settlements rapidly expand and the exchange of thoughts flourishes.'

name: Imperial Spy
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Stealth (This unit can\xe2\x80\x99t be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)\nOn Kill: Put a preparation counter on your champion.'

effect: b'Pride 4 (This ally won\xe2\x80\x99t obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher. You can\xe2\x80\x99t attack with, intercept with, or activate abilities of allies that don\xe2\x80\x99t obey you.)\n[Class Bonus] On Death: Summon a Powercell token rested.'

name: Manaroot
effect: b'Sacrifice Manaroot: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.'

name: Manufacture Cell
effect: b'Summon a Powercell token rested. If you control an Automaton, draw a card.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cStop by any of our local retail branches today!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advertisement'

name: Mechanical Hare
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a buff counter on Mechanical Hare.\nAs long as Mechanical Hare has two or more buff counters on it, it has \xe2\x80\x9cOn Attack: Banish up to two target cards in a single graveyard."'

name: Novice Healer
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Recover 3. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'

effect: b'Glimpse 2, then gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'

name: Overlord Mk III
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice four Powercells.\nIntercept, Spellshroud, Steadfast, True Sight\nAt the beginning of your end phase, you may banish an Automaton card from your graveyard. If you do, put a buff counter on Overlord Mk III and draw a card.'

name: Purification
effect: b'Recover 2. Then choose up to two Curse cards from your champion\xe2\x80\x99s lineage and discard them. For each card discarded this way, recover 2.'

name: Razorvine
effect: b'acrifice Razorvine: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Reprogram
effect: b'Up to one target ally gets -1 power until end of turn. If that ally is an Automaton, put two debuff counters on it instead. (Allies get -1 power and -1 life for each debuff counter on them.)\nFloating Memory'

name: Retold Fortune
effect: b'Discard up to one Spell card. If you do, draw a card.\n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Sadi, Blood Harvester
effect: b'2: Return Sadi to your hand. If you do, put a preparation counter on your champion.\n[Class Bonus] On Kill: You gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 \xe2\x80\x94 Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)'

effect: b'[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b'An impact that leaves your brain rattling.'

effect: b'Target Dagger weapon gets +2 power until end of turn.\n[Class Bonus] Put a preparation counter on your champion. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'

effect: b'Sacrifice Silvershine: Recover 1.'

effect: b'[Level 3+] Sacrifice Spirit Shard: Draw a card.'
flavor_text: b'Sundered from the strain of materialization, this shard of divine energy, once attuned to the roiling leylines of Azoth, can restore a champion\xe2\x80\x99s power.'

name: Springleaf

name: Turbo Charge
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a Powercell.\nDraw two cards.'

flavor_text: b'Hatred buries deep.'

effect: b'Whenever a domain enters the field under your control, deal 2 damage to target champion.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cFrom the skies, this vast world is ours to explore. Each peak and valley, every kingdom and city, a crown jewel to claim.\xe2\x80\x9d'

name: Arsenal Keeper
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may have Arsenal Keeper deal 2 damage to your champion. If you do, put a durability counter on a weapon you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'

name: Calamity Cannon
effect: b'[Polkhawk Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate.\nYour champion\xe2\x80\x99s first attack using a Gun weapon during your next turn gets +10 power.'

name: Captivating Cutthroat
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Captivating Cutthroat gets +1 power and has \xe2\x80\x9cOn Attack: Deal 1 damage to your champion.\xe2\x80\x9d (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'
flavor_text: b'Distractions in the heat of the moment can be lethal.'

name: Cell Forging
effect: b'Choose one \xe2\x80\x94\n\xe2\x80\xa2 Put two durability counters on target weapon.\n\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon a Powercell token.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cHere in our public factory tour, our engineers are hard at work designing brand new delights for you!\xe2\x80\x9d\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gearstride Automatics Advertisement'

name: Cell Handler
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Up to one target Animal or Beast ally you control loses pride and gets -1 power until end of turn. If that ally is an Automaton, summon a Powercell token rested.'

name: Charged Alchemist
effect: b'[Class Bonus] As long as you control a Powercell, Charged Alchemist gets +1 power and your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)\n'

name: Charged Gunslinger
effect: b'Ranged 2\n[Class Bonus] Whenever you sacrifice a Powercell, draw a card, then discard a card. If a fire element card was discarded, Charged Gunslinger becomes distant.'

name: Cinderbloom Tender
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Whenever you gather, deal 1 damage to each champion. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)'

name: Embershield Keeper
effect: b'Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) \n[Class Bonus] As long as Embershield Keeper is fostered, it gets +2 life.'

name: Kindling Flare

flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cLet it all go up in flame.\xe2\x80\x9d'

name: Molten Cinder

name: Potion Infusion: Blaze
effect: b'Rest target Potion. If you do, it gains \xe2\x80\x9cOn Sacrifice: Deal 4 damage to target attacking ally\xe2\x80\x9d until end of turn.'

effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may have Priestess of Flame deal 3 damage to your champion. If you do, gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'

name: Pyroclastic Flow
effect: b'Deal 2 damage to all units.'
flavor_text: b'Long dormant lava veins erupted as Azoth shuddered. Plumes of molten rock drowned the Oasis in an inferno.'

name: Reduce to Ash
effect: b'Destroy target item or weapon with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less.'

name: Scorching Trap
effect: b'[Class Bonus] If it\xe2\x80\x99s not your turn, you may remove a preparation counter from your champion to activate this card from your memory without paying its reserve cost. \nDeal 2 damage to target attacking unit.\n'

name: Smashing Force
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish two fire element cards from your graveyard. When you do, destroy target item or weapon with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less.'
flavor_text: b'An immense swing over-calibrated into a shattering impact. '

name: Surge Protector
effect: b'Until end of turn, target Shield item you control gains \xe2\x80\x9cIf damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent that damage and sacrifice this object instead.\xe2\x80\x9d'
flavor_text: b'A broken shield is much cheaper to replace than a broken body.'

name: Surging Bolt
